skills.label: Account-Based Marketing Strategy
skills.description: Designing and running multi-tier ABM programs (1:many, 1:few, 1:1), mapping buying committees, and aligning Sales + Marketing motions around target accounts.

skills.label: Demand Generation & Campaigns
skills.description: Integrated campaigns across paid search, paid social, email, and events — including funnel design, nurture journeys, and collaboration with BDRs and Sales.

skills.label: Marketing Operations
skills.description: Building scalable marketing processes, lead scoring models, attribution setups, and automations that keep campaigns reliable and measurable.

skills.label: Revenue Operations
skills.description: Connecting Marketing, Sales, and CS systems to enable end-to-end funnel visibility and automation, with clean data and shared GTM telemetry.

skills.label: Analytics & BI
skills.description: Designing reporting frameworks, dashboards, and attribution models that connect activity to pipeline, ARR, and customer value.

skills.label: Web & Digital Experience
metrics: Time on site for key personas
skills.description: Owning marketing web properties, experimentation, and UX improvements that lift engagement and conversions for priority audiences.

skills.label: Content, Events & Digital Experiences
skills.description: Creating and orchestrating digital experiences (webinars, nurture paths, content hubs) that move prospects through education to evaluation.

skills.label: Customer Insights & Feedback
skills.description: Structuring customer feedback loops and using VOC data to inform lifecycle programs, upsell plays, and product marketing.

skills.label: Social & Community Marketing
skills.description: Designing social and community programs (like your Crowd Factory / Get Satisfaction era) that amplify content and deepen customer relationships.

skills.label: Sales & Field Enablement
metrics: Lift in win-rate for enabled opportunities
skills.description: Building playbooks, trainings, and content to help Sales use campaigns, insights, and tools effectively (like your DemandBase & Salesforce enablement).

skills.label: Events & Field Marketing
skills.description: Major trade shows and field events — like NRF and HIMSS — integrated with campaigns, BDR coaching, and exec briefings.

skills.label: Leadership & GTM Strategy
skills.description: Defining GTM strategy, leading teams, and translating complex marketing & ops capabilities into clear narratives for executives and stakeholders.
